meta.title: Gray's Resume
meta.description: This is Gray's personal resume website

home.self1: Hello! I'm Gray Yuan, a developer who loves technology. I used to go by Gusty, I thought it sounded cool back then, but later found it's hard to pronounce and a bit weird...
home.self2: I have four years of experience in WEB full-stack development, and I'm also passionate about exploring Android and Windows application development, having built a few small projects. My hobbies are games, anime/manga, and movies; they always inspire new ideas. I also go jogging on weekends... after all, you need stamina for overtime.
home.self3: If you are interested in my skills or experience, please feel free to contact me. Thank you!
home.experience7: Returned home to work as a C# Engineer

skill.react: Self-taught, and have used it at work.
skill.java: Used this for a living, but haven't touched it in a long time.
skill.python: Just use it a bit for writing small tools.
skill.csharp: This is what I use for a living now.
skill.typescript: I write a lot of JS, but only have a basic understanding of TS.
skill.flutter: Only built small projects with it.
skill.japaneseDesc: Although I passed the N2, I've barely spoken any Japanese...

portfolio.selfText: These are all small projects, nothing particularly amazing.
portfolio.order_drink: A simple drink ordering webpage made with React.
portfolio.gusty_little_world: Written with html+css+js, an embarrassing project from my early days.
portfolio.anime_list: Made with Flutter, a list to check for new anime.
portfolio.cram_for_interview: Made with React Native, a simple question bank for interviews.
portfolio.pc_customizer: Made with Blazor Hybrid, scrapes CoolPC products to build custom PC part lists.
portfolio.gusty_dog: A LINE Bot connected to the Gemini API.
